channel.title: Worried. =S
channel.description:
I am wanting to host and make a server but i am worried about people hacking me.
What is the chance of getting hacked? also Which is safer no-ip or ham because with no-ip you open the port in your firewall. [i dont really want to do that]
so please can some one say how much chance ther is of getting hacked.
Thank you in advance.
P K J00

item.title: Worried. =S
item.dc:creator: @Fool_Of_Doom Fool Of Doom
item.description:
@Fool_Of_Doom wrote:

Well first of all, i doubt anyone would hack you through your server. And plus, they wouldhave to know your password. So dont worry my friend.

Read full topic

item.title: Worried. =S
item.dc:creator: @dylan1 dylan1
item.description:
@dylan1 wrote:

nobody will hack you unless they know your pass :. and if they know how to hack you othewise, then im sure they would have no need to take your server.

Read full topic
